pwaUpdateAvailableDescription: A new version is ready. Please click on the reload button to get the latest updates.

nuxtSiteConfig.name: Cost per unit calculator
nuxtSiteConfig.description: A modern, progressive web app for calculating the cost per unit of products. Compare prices effectively by normalizing them to a common unit (e.g., cost per kg, per liter, per pound, etc.).

pwaOfflineAvailableDescription: The application is ready to be used offline.
